description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Major Features and Improvements

* Bulk deletion and update of messages in PST
* Support for Gmail IMAP protocol extensions
* ImapClient: Delete and change message flags for set of messages
* Use mail server IP address for connecting the ImapClient and Pop3Client without DNS resolution
* Option to read X-APPLE-FILENAME for attachments in ICS from IOS
* Improvement of copy method. Add ability to "copy" multiple messages per invocation

All Changes

Features

EMAILNET-34828 - Bulk deletion and update of messages in PST for optimized I/O
EMAILNET-35021 - Add support for Gmail IMAP protocol extensions
EMAILNET-35167 - Add new features in the IMAP4 extended list command
EMAILNET-35205 - Add new features in the IMAP4 ID extension (rfc2971)
EMAILNET-35226 - Add ability in ImapClient to delete messagese and change flags for set of messages

Enhancements

EMAILNET-35230 - Use mail server IP address for connecting the ImapClient and Pop3Client without DNS resolution
EMAILNET-35240 - Option to read X-APPLE-FILENAME for attachments in ICS from IOS
EMAILNET-35242 - Improvement of copy method. Add ability to "copy" multiple messages per invocation

Bugs

EMAILNET-34799 - Delete of items from PST: resultant file has very large size
EMAILNET-34800 - Deleting Msgs from PST takes large time
EMAILNET-35223 - SetBodyContent breaks the special characters
EMAILNET-35229 - Spaces are lost while saving Rich Text mail as MSG
EMAILNET-35235 - Given document can't be processed
EMAILNET-35237 - Wrong MIME content type read from ICS attachments
EMAILNET-35241 - Recipient not allowed to respond to the appointment
EMAILNET-35245 - EML(from Gmail) -> Mhtml: Headers are not visible in MS Word
EMAILNET-35251 - Unable to connect to Exchange Server 2010 using TLS
EMAILNET-35225 - Signed and Encrypted message body is null while fetched by Aspose.Email
EMAILNET-35224 - Saving Contact as MSG raises ArgumentException
EMAILNET-35236 - System.Format Exception raised while loading ICS file
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
